links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
formula: G.f.: 64*x*(1+20*x+29*x^2+4*x^3)/(1-x)^5. - Colin Barker, Jan 06 2012a(n) = 16n^2*(3n-1)^2. - Vincenzo Librandi, Jan 07 2012
